roleset.name: see into the future
roleset.note: FORESEE-V NOTES: Heheheh, "Mr. Lego." Ah, the mental images. (from foresee.01-v)

example.name: very boring
example.text: Mr. Lego said the company foresees the need for a major boost in new-generation capability throughout the 1990s.
example.arg: the need for a major boost in new-generation capability throughout the 1990s

roleset.name: able to be predicted
roleset.note: FORESEEABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'foresee.01'. (from foreseeable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: It can be foreseeable that confrontation between the two sides will inevitably occur , but whether the West will directly carry out military intervention or carry out a proxy war is temporarily , still only a kind of strategic speculation .
example.arg: that confrontation between the two sides will inevitably occur
